title: Pomodoro
music_lock_msg: Stop the timer to change music.
quote_1: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. - Lao Tzu
quote_2: Excellence is not an act, but a habit. - Aristotle
quote_3: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop. - Confucius
quote_4: The future depends on what you do today. - Mahatma Gandhi
quote_5: Victory belongs to those who can say 'Victory is mine'. - M. Kemal Atatürk
quote_7: Manage your time, manage your life.
quote_8: Stay hungry, stay foolish. - Steve Jobs
quote_9: Talent wins games, but teamwork wins championships. - M. Jordan
quote_10: The obstacle is the way. - Marcus Aurelius
quote_11: Imagination is more important than knowledge. - Albert Einstein
quote_12: Insanity is doing the same thing over and over and expecting different results. - Albert Einstein
quote_13: The present is theirs; the future, for which I really worked, is mine. - Nikola Tesla
quote_14: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work. - Thomas Edison
quote_15: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change. - Stephen Hawking
quote_16: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. - Marie Curie
quote_17: If I have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants. - Isaac Newton
quote_18: Doubt is the father of invention. - Galileo Galilei
quote_19: It is not the strongest of the species that survives... It is the one that is most adaptable to change. - Charles Darwin
quote_20: Learning never exhausts the mind. - Leonardo da Vinci
quote_21: An unexamined life is not worth living. - Socrates
quote_22: He who rules himself can rule the world. - Plato
quote_23: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet. - Aristotle
quote_24: That which does not kill us makes us stronger. - Friedrich Nietzsche
quote_25: It is not enough to have a good mind; the main thing is to use it well. - René Descartes
quote_26: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself. - Rumi
quote_27: Knowledge is to understand; knowledge is to understand yourself. - Yunus Emre
quote_28: To see the limit of the possible, you must attempt the impossible. - Mehmed the Conqueror
quote_29: There are no incurable diseases — only the lack of will. - Ibn Sina
quote_30: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body. - Seneca
quote_31: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters. - Epictetus
quote_32: When you arise in the morning think of what a privilege it is to be alive. - Marcus Aurelius
quote_33: Knowing is not enough, we must apply. Willing is not enough, we must do. - Bruce Lee
quote_34: Don't count the days, make the days count. - Muhammad Ali
quote_35: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying. - Michael Jordan
quote_36: Patience is a key element of success. - Bill Gates
quote_37: If you get up in the morning and think the future is going to be better, it is a bright day. - Elon Musk
quote_38: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. - Steve Jobs
quote_39: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings. - Wright Brothers
quote_40: Most people believe in intelligence, I do not, what distinguishes us is effort. - Aziz Sancar
quote_41: He who takes no risks drinks no champagne. - Georgy Zhukov
quote_42: The darkest hour is just before the dawn.
quote_43: Water cuts through stone, not because of its power, but because of its persistence.
quote_44: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
quote_45: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough. - Einstein
quote_46: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere. - Einstein
quote_47: Creativity is contagious, pass it on. - Einstein
quote_48: Genius is making complex ideas simple. - Einstein
quote_49: Do not put off for tomorrow what you can do today.
quote_50: Your only limit is your mind.
quote_51: The most genuine guide in life is science and knowledge. - M. Kemal Atatürk
quote_53: We can only see the change we wish to be. - Plato
quote_54: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the taking of action in spite of fear. - Aristotle
quote_55: I think, therefore I am. - René Descartes
quote_56: If you ought to do it, you can do it. - Immanuel Kant
quote_57: You must dare to burn with your own flame. - Friedrich Nietzsche
quote_58: Only he who knows who he is, knows who everything is. - Lao Tzu
quote_59: To win without fighting is the greatest mastery. - Sun Tzu
quote_60: Details make perfection, and perfection is not a detail. - Leonardo da Vinci
quote_61: The important thing is not to stop questioning. - Albert Einstein
quote_62: You must take risks to progress. - Marie Curie
quote_63: Measure what is measurable, and make measurable what is not so. - Galileo Galilei
quote_64: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at. - Stephen Hawking
quote_65: Every step you take towards your goal is the only step you take. - Confucius
quote_66: The most valuable thing is time. - Goethe
quote_67: The perfect is the enemy of the good. - Voltaire
quote_68: Postponement is the greatest impediment to life. - Seneca
quote_69: Education is the greatest adornment. - Epictetus
quote_70: Do what you must. Pay no heed to what others think. - Marcus Aurelius
quote_71: The man who cannot face his own darkness can't shed light on others' darkness. - Carl Jung
quote_72: Virtue is the strength of will. - Immanuel Kant
quote_73: To work is the antidote to evil. - Jean-Jacques Rousseau
quote_74: The important thing is not to go, but to know where you are. - Martin Heidegger
quote_75: You are free in your choices. - Jean-Paul Sartre
quote_76: To live one's own life is a great responsibility. - Simone de Beauvoir
quote_77: There is no path to happiness; happiness is the path. - Buddha
quote_78: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising every time we fail. - Confucius
quote_79: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great. - Zig Ziglar
quote_80: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently. - Henry Ford
quote_81: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up. - Thomas Edison
quote_82: Narrow your focus to one thing. - Elon Musk
quote_83: Just focus on succeeding in the long run. - Jeff Bezos
quote_84: I choose a lazy person to do a difficult job, because a lazy person will find an easy way to do it. - Bill Gates
quote_85: Simple can be harder than complex. - Steve Jobs
quote_86: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now. - Warren Buffett
quote_87: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan next week. - George S. Patton
quote_88: Focus on being yourself. Everything else will follow. - Oprah Winfrey
quote_89: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better. - Maya Angelou
quote_90: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions. - Dalai Lama
quote_91: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it. - Paulo Coelho
quote_92: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken. - Oscar Wilde
quote_93: Yesterday is gone, tomorrow is unknown; today is a gift. - Rumi
quote_94: Knowledge is man's recognition of his own nature. - Al-Farabi
quote_95: Eat less, talk less, sleep less; your life will be better. - Avicenna
quote_96: Let food be your medicine and medicine be your food. - Hippocrates
quote_97: Time is very valuable. We must use it in the best way. - M. Kemal Atatürk
quote_98: The most difficult task is to do nothing. - Martin Luther King Jr.
quote_99: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. - Albert Schweitzer
quote_100: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself. - George Bernard Shaw
reset_dialog_content: All statistics will be deleted. Are you sure?
break_over_msg: Let's get back to work. Focus!
work_completed_msg: Great job! You earned a break.
change_lock_msg: Stop the timer to change duration.
unlock_theme_msg: Watch a short video to unlock this theme.
ad_loading: Ad is loading, please try again...
